unnormalised: Hoping for swift recoveries! The BCCI and fans across India are concerned about Bumrah's back. Sources say it's similar to Irfan Pathan's issue in 2006. We wish Rishabh Pant a quick return to form after his injury. Remember "Chak De! India"? Team spirit matters. Updates expected post-match. Let's pray for zero injuries during the upcoming Ranji Trophy games in Chennai. Next update on 15th Aug.
normalised: Hoping for swift recoveries! The B C C I and fans across India are concerned about Bumrah's back. Sources say it's similar to Irfan Pathan's issue in two thousand and six. We wish Rishabh Pant a quick return to form after his injury. Remember "Chak De! India"? Team spirit matters. Updates expected post-match. Let's pray for zero injuries during the upcoming Ranji Trophy games in Chennai. Next update on fifteenth August.
